entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who tries to help Dumbledore. He says 'It's all right, Professor, it's all right!' and offers Dumbledore an antidote.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a professor who is being affected by the potion. He screams and begs Harry to make it stop.

relationships.description: Harry tries to help Dumbledore by offering him an antidote.
Harry comforts Dumbledore and tells him that everything will be all right.
